frontend: Completed the UI for menu browsing and search functionality.
Finalized the design for the checkout screen.
backend: API for user authentication and payment processing is now operational.
Resolved issues with order synchronization in the database.
qa: Completed testing of the menu display feature on mobile devices.
Reported 3 critical bugs related to order tracking.

blockers.frontend: Delay in integrating the payment gateway due to API response inconsistencies.
blockers.backend: Difficulty in handling high-volume order simulations during stress testing.
blockers.qa: Limited test coverage for older Android versions causing feature incompatibilities.

frontend: Begin integration of the payment gateway once API fixes are applied.
Collaborate with the backend team to improve order status updates in the UI.
backend: Optimize server response time to handle peak loads.
Fix payment API inconsistencies and re-run tests.
qa: Expand test scenarios to include edge cases for mobile responsiveness.
Verify fixes for the reported bugs in the next sprint.

frontend: Implemented responsive design for the user profile page.
Updated the navigation bar to include a quick access menu.
backend: Enhanced API security for user data endpoints.
Deployed a new caching mechanism to reduce database load.
qa: Verified the functionality of the user profile page across devices.
Conducted exploratory testing on the payment flow.

blockers.frontend: Challenges in optimizing animations for older browsers.
blockers.qa: Insufficient test cases for cross-browser compatibility.

frontend: Resolve animation optimization issues and test on targeted browsers.
Collaborate with the design team to finalize the dashboard UI.
backend: Address database migration issues and validate the data integrity.
Improve logging mechanisms to facilitate debugging.
qa: Expand test scenarios to include cross-browser and cross-device testing.
Follow up on reported issues with detailed bug reports.

frontend: Refactored the homepage to improve load times and performance.
Updated the footer design to be more user-friendly.
backend: Optimized database queries to improve load time.
Implemented a new API for retrieving real-time user data.
qa: Tested the new homepage performance under different network conditions.
Verified that the real-time user data API returns correct results.

blockers.frontend: Difficulty in ensuring cross-device compatibility for the updated homepage.
blockers.backend: Issues with the caching layer causing outdated data to be served.
blockers.qa: Test failures on certain mobile browsers due to rendering issues.

frontend: Ensure homepage updates are fully responsive on all devices.
Test with various screen resolutions and adjust the footer layout accordingly.
backend: Resolve caching issues and implement better cache invalidation.
Run performance benchmarks for the real-time data API.
qa: Test the homepage on more mobile devices and ensure compatibility.
Prepare test cases for stress testing the real-time user data API.
